(Firefox, are the shields of the CF down or up?  Also, how is anyone having 
the Key to Vector Sigma?  It was destroyed by Silverbolt in the G1 episodes 
and BM hasn't happened, so I'm at a loss.  Could someone explain?)

The Oblitercons/The Protectobots:



Dark One was in his hover and cursed at the idiocy of the Maximals.  There 
were only several resisting the decision to end the fighting, but they were 
enough to make Dark One angry.

"Oblitercons, this is Dark One, open fire on every last Maximal who fired 
those shots!  Don't rest until they're dead or I say otherwise!  Only focus 
on them!"

He loaded up his missiles, firing off 25 laser blasts from his nosecone down 
at Angel Prime.

---

Breakdown raised his grenade launcher, firing off two grenades set to explode 
on impact at Blade Runner after receiving his leader's orders.

---

Pyro was pulled out of the mud in time to hear Dark One's orders.  "Blasted 
Maxis..." he said as he powered up his optic weapons, firing off five rapid 
blasts at Depth Charge.

---

Hiss made a strange look at his hands as they were covered in mud, his 
expression changing to anger at Dark One's information and watching Angel 
Prime's spectacle.

"Damn Maximals are making us look good by betraying the cease fire!" he 
laughed, firing off four blasts from his fusion cannon at Icedragon.

---

Scavenger raised his chain gun, firing off 25 armor-piercing rounds at Fury's 
abdomen.  "Take that you treacherous fools!"

===

Hot Spot looked up, seeing Angel Prime.  "You stupid...Screw you!" he yelled. 
  He wasn't going to help him.  The sooner the battle ended the sooner his 
near dead comrades could get help.  He knelt back down, welding.

---

Groove gave a nasty glare at Angel Prime, standing to his feet and keeping 
his weapon ready.  If it broke out into all out war he'd be ready.

---

First Aid layed on the ground, mech-fluid bubblling out of his nose and
